product_name: Sea to Summit Big River Dry Bag - 65 Liters
long_description: The protective Sea to Summit Big River dry bag was created with land and water adventurers in mind. Fully taped seams and a Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provide reliable waterproof performance. Polyurethane-coated nylon body makes this a lightweight yet durable choice. Oval base resists rolling and stays where you put it. Durable attachment points secure sack to a pack or kayak. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The protective Sea to Summit Big River dry bag was created with land and water adventurers in mind.
